properties.description: This policy set requires virtual machines to have the tags 'update allowed' and 'severity group monthly'

nonComplianceMessages.message: The tag 'Severity Group Monthly' is either missing, empty or the syntax is incorrect.
nonComplianceMessages.policyDefinitionReferenceId: Require a tag 'Severity Group Monthly' exists and is not empty

nonComplianceMessages.message: Disabling Updates is not implemented yet. The tag 'Update Allowed' must be set to 'yes' to avoid disruptions of Updates, when the effect of this tag is implemented in a later version.
